original_title: The Return of Rin Tin Tin
overview: A World War II European orphan, Paul, has lost all faith in humanity. Brought to the United States by Father Mathew, Paul's confidence and faith are gradually restored through his close association with a dog, Rin-Tin-Tin.
tagline: HE'S BACK!...in the most human heart-warming picture in years!
title: The Return of Rin Tin Tin
